featured.text: D. Daniel To me, a zoo can be a good place for endangered species which have difficulty finding suitable mates in the wild.
First, ice must be carefully selected so that it is suitable for sculpting.
While offering budget-conscious travelers a unique option, capsule hotels may not be suitable for everyone.
Here is a sentence: “Almost nothing of a fish is left for the trash bin.” Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?
Which of the four jobs might be more suitable for her? 4.

other.text: Which paragraph is most suitable to have it as the final sentence?

definition.en_def: Right or appropriate for a particular purpose or situation.
definition.example: This dress is suitable for the formal event.
